definition: prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
completing the square (method of solving quadratic equation, math.)

sentences.english: The optimum recipe for ginger-cake processing was studied with orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 以正交實驗研究了添加姜粉蛋糕的配方。

sentences.english: Added a new recipe for shield reinforcements that increases the block value of shields.
sentences.chinese: 增加了一個新的配方，可爲盾牌附魔增加其格擋值。

sentences.english: The compound formulation for calendered belt of steel- belted radial tire was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究半鋼子午線輪胎壓延法帶束層膠配方。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蘊含持久配方，質地溫和易上色。

sentences.english: The special formulation of curliness make eyelash hold out for long time keep the curliness.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的旋翹配方使睫毛持久保持旋翹。

sentences.english: Dual-layer liquid formula has shinning watery texture.
sentences.chinese: 雙層液體配方，明亮水珠質地。

sentences.english: In many instances, antiseptics, anti -mildew agents etc. might be added to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 在許多情況下，配方中要加人防腐劑，防黴劑等。

sentences.english: Yellow bell peppers add color and flavor to any recipe.
sentences.chinese: 黃柿子椒添加顏色和味道的任何配方。

sentences.english: A kind of light-control material was studied and its effect was tested in the lab.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種調光材料的配方優化及其作用效果。

sentences.english: Q. Does the formula contain any whole-food blends?
sentences.chinese: 配方是否含有任何完整食物？

sentences.english: Some blacksmithing recipes require leather, which you will need to buy from a skinner.
sentences.chinese: 某些鍛造配方還需要皮革，你可以從剝皮者那裏購買。

sentences.english: Otherwise, special infant formula is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 不然的話，建議用特殊嬰兒配方。

sentences.english: Low phosphor formula ensure the translator of ternary catalysis work normally.
sentences.chinese: 低磷配方確保三元催化轉換器正常工作。

sentences.english: Stop headachy Chinese traditional medicine recipe?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有止頭痛的中藥配方？

sentences.english: A general program of formulating of recipe suitable for self-drying water-soluble alkyd resin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了適合於水溶性醇酸樹脂配方設計的通用程序。

definition: to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
